PredatorDrone.Name: General Atomics MQ-1 Predator
PredatorDrone.Description: A medium-altitude, long-endurance unmanned aerial vehicle primarily used for reconnaissance and light attack missions.

Material.description: 1/4" aircraft-grade aluminum, such as 6061 or 7075 aluminum alloys

QuadCopter.Name: Average Off-the-Shelf Quadcopter
QuadCopter.Description: A consumer-grade drone designed for recreational use, typically featuring lightweight construction and moderate speed capabilities.

Material.description: Lightweight materials like plastic, carbon fiber, and aluminum components
